sentences.en: A giant wildcat is being hunted after 58 lambs were butchered.
sentences.cn: 一只大野猫在捕杀了58只羊羔后遭到猎捕。

sentences.en: Drilling there would be strictly a wildcat operation.
sentences.cn: 在那里钻井绝对是一次盲目的行动.

sentences.en: Frustration, anger and desperation have led to a series of wildcat strikes.
sentences.cn: 挫败感、愤怒和绝望引发了一系列自发性罢工。
野猫队的超级巨星害怕了?

sentences.en: Like many misers, Roucolle came to a bad end through putting his money into wildcat scheme.
sentences.cn: 跟很多吝啬鬼一样, 鲁科勒因为钱被人骗走而下场悲惨.

sentences.en: My sister turns into a wildcat when she gets mad.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐生气时会变成一头野狮.

sentences.en: Outside in the distance a wildcat did growl.
sentences.cn: 远方,一只野猫在低声吼叫.

sentences.en: Party A with totle drilling cost, contract wildcat to be drilled to artesian well contractor.
sentences.cn: 甲方以总成本, 将油井承包给钻井承包商钻探.

sentences.en: Reasonable casing program is of key importance to the successful drilling of a wildcat.
sentences.cn: 合理的井身结构,对探井的钻探施工至关重要.

sentences.en: The Tannoy Wildcat range consisted of following speaker systems.
sentences.cn: 天朗野猫的范围包括以下扬声器系统.

sentences.en: The wildcat could have been on either side of the valley.
sentences.cn: 豹猫可能在山谷的某一侧.

sentences.en: The wildcat have to HAs be on eitIt'side of the valley.
sentences.cn: 豹猫估计在山谷的某一侧.

sentences.en: The wildcat should be fitted in with anchor chain.
You are so crazy, Wildcat And what is it with you and trees?
sentences.cn: 你真疯狂小野猫你怎么那么喜欢上树?
